title: Biohazard Quarantine Zone Adventure #34
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Decontamination Chamber
rooms.description: A sterile white room with harsh fluorescent lighting. Yellow and black biohazard symbols cover the walls. Chemical showers line one side, and the air smells of disinfectant. Emergency lights flash red. A hazmat suit hangs on the wall, and a metal locker stands in the corner.

items.name: emergency supply locker
items.description: A tall metal locker with two compartments and a biohazard warning label

items.name: evacuation protocol document
items.description: An official document with emergency procedures
items.text: EVACUATION PROTOCOL: In case of containment breach, proceed to Research Lab Alpha. Lead scientist Dr Webb (ID: 2847) has access to antidote storage. Chief of Security is Director Hayes. Outbreak originated in Sector C.

items.name: security access keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard with a red stripe and biohazard symbol

items.name: hanging hazmat suit
items.description: A protective suit with multiple pockets and equipment

items.name: contamination incident report
items.description: A crumpled report with handwritten notes
items.text: INCIDENT REPORT: Pathogen breach in Sector C at 0600 hours. Dr Chen was first responder. Antidote Formula X7 is stored in the secure vault. Vault combination is the year of the first recorded pandemic plus the current facility level (4).

items.name: reinforced airlock door
items.description: A heavy steel door with a card reader and multiple locks. Red warning lights flash around the frame.

rooms.name: Research Laboratory Alpha
rooms.description: A large laboratory filled with overturned equipment and shattered glass. Microscopes and centrifuges sit on metal tables. Specimen containers are scattered across the floor. Warning signs indicate hazardous materials. Three information boards hang on the walls, and a biometric vault door dominates the east wall.

items.name: information board for Dr Webb
items.description: A board with a photo and details about the lead scientist
items.text: Dr. Sarah Webb - Lead Virologist. Employee ID: 2847. Specializes in pathogen research and antidote development. Office located in Sector C.

items.name: information board for Dr Chen
items.description: A board showing a researcher in protective gear
items.text: Dr. Michael Chen - Biochemist. First responder to containment breaches. Known for quick thinking during the 1918 pandemic research project.

items.name: information board for Director Hayes
items.description: A board displaying the security director
items.text: Director Patricia Hayes - Chief of Security. Responsible for facility lockdown protocols and emergency evacuations. Authorized for all secure areas.

items.name: overturned lab table
items.description: A metal table with drawers, knocked on its side with papers scattered around

items.name: Webb research notes
items.description: A notebook filled with scientific observations and formulas
items.text: Research Notes: Formula X7 shows promise as universal antidote. Stored in vault for safety. Vault combination based on 1918 pandemic year plus facility level 4 equals 19184. Keep Chen ID badge for backup vault access.

items.name: Chen ID badge
items.description: An identification badge with a magnetic strip and photo

items.name: locked specimen cabinet
items.description: A refrigerated cabinet with a combination lock displaying four digits

items.name: Formula X7 antidote
items.description: A vial containing a glowing blue liquid labeled as the universal antidote

items.name: biometric vault door
items.description: A high-security door with a biometric scanner and a terminal displaying three security questions

password_questions.question: Who is the Chief of Security?
password_questions.hint: Check the information boards in the laboratory

password_questions.question: Where did the outbreak originate?
password_questions.hint: The evacuation protocol mentions the outbreak location

password_questions.question: What year was the first recorded pandemic?
password_questions.hint: Dr Chen's information board references a pandemic research project

rooms.name: Emergency Rooftop Helipad
rooms.description: You burst through the vault door onto the facility rooftop. Fresh air fills your lungs as a rescue helicopter waits with rotors spinning. The pilot waves urgently. Behind you, the quarantined facility is sealed. You clutch the antidote that will save countless lives. The nightmare is over.

items.name: rescue helicopter
items.description: A medical evacuation helicopter with red cross markings, ready for immediate departure

items.name: rescue pilot
items.description: A pilot in flight gear gesturing for you to board quickly

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You have escaped the Biohazard Quarantine Zone with the Formula X7 antidote! The helicopter lifts off as the facility is sealed below. Thanks to your bravery and puzzle-solving skills, the antidote will be mass-produced and the outbreak contained. You are a hero! You win!
